title.rendered: Study in UK Universities Without IELTS for Pakistani Students 2025

content.rendered:
Pakistani students usually find the IELTS exam difficult to pass, and they seek opportunities without an English Proficiency test. Thus, there are many universities in the UK which offer admissions without IELTS. However, finding UK universities without IELTS might need a little hassle. Also, these universities have their own English proficiency requirements, such as taking English language courses there or providing proof of English proficiency. These universities use different methods to check international students’ English skills and make education accessible to them.

So, how can you study in the UK without IELTS? What are the options available to you, and how can you benefit from them? Let’s explore everything in this guide. We will cover the universities accepting MOI and offering options other than IELTS. Keep reading; there’s much more to explore!

Table of Contents

Toggle
  • Accepted English Language Tests Other Than IELTS for UK Universities
    • Requirements of UK Universities Without IELTS for Admissions
    • List of Top UK Universities That Don’t Require IELTS
    • List of UK Universities Accepting MOI
    • How to Study in the UK Without IELTS?
    • Scholarships for Pakistani Students to Study in the UK Without IELTS
    • Job Opportunities for Pakistani Students in the UK without IELTS
    • FAQs
      • Do I need IELTS to Study in the UK?
      • What are some major alternatives to IELTS?
    • Can I study in the UK without taking any English tests?
    • Which UK universities accept students without IELTS?

Accepted English Language Tests Other Than IELTS for UK Universities

UK universities without IELTS offer many other options for Pakistani students to pursue their education in the UK. There are alternative English proficiency tests for students so that they can be admitted easily. These tests also assess students’ English language skills, including reading, listening, writing, and speaking. The most common tests are:

  • TOEFL (Test of English as a Foreign Language)
  • PTE (Pearson Test of English)
  • Duolingo English Test
  • Oxford ELLT (English Language Level Test)
  • LanguageCert (Language Skills Assessment and Certification)
  • Cambridge English Exams (such as C1 Advanced & C2 Proficiency)
  • MOI (Medium of Instruction)

These tests assess the same skills as IELTS. However, their scoring system is a little different. Don’t be confident about applying for UK universities directly with any of these tests. The reason is that the test requirements are different for each university. It’s possible for one university to accept PTE while others go for Oxford ELLT. Therefore, it’s best to leave this task to your best education consultant.

Requirements of UK Universities Without IELTS for Admissions

The UK universities have certain requirements to give students admission without IELTS. Each university has its own criteria and selection procedure, so it’s best to do some research and process the details accordingly. Here are some requirements you will find while applying to a UK university:

  1. English language skills should be equal to CLB Level B2 (Upper-Intermediate) or Higher. CLB stands for Canadian Language Benchmarks.
  2. For MOI, the student should have 70% or above marks in English if the university needs an IELTS overall test score of 6.5 with individual bands no less than 5.5.
  3. Short courses in English and 60% in 10th-12th standard English are also acceptable.
  4. If you don’t have any English language test, the universities can offer a pre-sessional course in the language.
  5. A Bachelor’s degree in English can help a little, but it’s not compulsory.

Looking at the above points, it’s important to have reliable study abroad consultants like EduCrest Migration on your back. These educational consultants in Islamabad know all the requirements for Studying in the UK. Just consult with them, and they will lay down the list of universities offering IELTS options.

Want to Prepare for English Language Proficiency Test Our IELTS test coaching can help with IELTS, PTE, Oxford ELLT, and others.

List of Top UK Universities That Don’t Require IELTS

There are many universities in the UK that do not implement the IELTS conditions. However, as a student should have a certain level of proficiency in English, they do have some other alternatives. Here’s the list of UK universities without IELTS:

List of UK Universities Accepting MOI

How to Study in the UK Without IELTS?

You need to complete all the requirements for admission processing and visa application before going to study in the UK. This process includes gradual steps, each with different requirements and procedures. Here’s the simplest method to study in UK universities without IELTS:

  1. Choose reliable education consultants like EduCrest Migration, which offers services for study in UK consultancy.
  2. Tell them about your academic profile and the English test requirements you want.
  3. Choose a university and course with the help of your assigned educational consultant and apply to them.
  4. Get an unconditional CAS letter (Confirmation of Acceptance of Studies).
  5. Prepare your documents for your visa, such as a CAS letter, passport, bank statement, and others.
  6. Let your consultant file the UK visa for you, pay the UK Visa Fee and wait for its approval.
  7. Attend the UK visa interview if required (You are not ready, but you can get training from the experts).
  8. Receive your visa approval and collect your BRP (Biometric Residence Permit).
  9. Get ready to fly to the UK and start a prosperous career.

Scholarships for Pakistani Students to Study in the UK Without IELTS

Many organizations in the UK offer fully funded and partial scholarships for Pakistani students. These scholarships usually cover the tuition fees, travelling, and living expenses of students in the UK. Other than that, there are many universities offering scholarships at the time of admission. They help the students ease their financial burden and save bucks to live there. However, to get a fully funded scholarship in the UK, organizations might need special qualities in you that can bring about change.

Other than these, many locally funded scholarships help aspiring students with academic excellence to study in the UK. However, it’s best to do proper research for the requirements of UK scholarships for Pakistani students.

Job Opportunities for Pakistani Students in the UK without IELTS

Studying in the UK gives Pakistani students the right exposure to enhance their confidence and English proficiency. Thus, when they complete their degrees, they can apply for the job and work there with a 2-year post-study work visa. This graduate route visa allows Pakistani Students to work there at any skill.

FAQs

Do I need IELTS to Study in the UK?

Well, IELTS is not a must to study in the UK. However, proof of English proficiency is a must; that’s the reason why universities opt for different English test alternatives.

What are some major alternatives to IELTS?

TOEFL, PTE, Language Cert, Oxford ELLT, Duolingo, and Cambridge are some of the major alternatives to IELTS.

Can I study in the UK without taking any English tests?

Yes, you can study in the UK without any English test, but you still need to provide UK universities with proof of English proficiency. For this, the university should accept MOI (Medium of Instruction). However, there are very few universities in the UK that accept MOI from very few Pakistani universities.

Which UK universities accept students without IELTS?

Many UK universities accept students without IELTS, starting from the University of Bristol and Greenwich to Birmingham City University and London Metropolitan University.
